name: The One Spell
description:
" Simplest of all spells is the Magic Shield. Easy to learn, hard to master, it saved many lives and proved useful in many ways."

The One Spell is a small project done as part of a Technifutur training course in Game Development. 

The Team : 

Cédric Staes - Developer 
Corentin Gengler - Developer 
Alexandre Brull - Game Artist
Bruno Lorenzi - Game Artist

Thanks to : 

Jean-philippe Servais - Sound FX
Mollie Schietecatte - Music co-composer
